metadata.title: CVE-2022-0097 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to97.0.4692.71 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to to potentially allow extension to escape the sandboxvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
